string.text: What happened?! He died?! Come back immediately!
What happened?! He died?! Take measurements and come back immediately!
To disable the wonderful setting, press ($$ACTION_USE$$)
To include a wonderful setting, press ($$ACTION_USE$$)
Well done, Labeled, did you get to the lab. It is imperative for us to learn the installation that is there. Try to disable it, so we were able to explore.

Look, a prototype can not long be protected from strong radiation. I have provided such a case, so when you're under the strong influence you have, turn on the timer. When the time expires, the prototype will cease to protect you. Be careful, and not forget about the timer.

Well, Bullseye! Radiation is disabled, you're alive. We called a few military helicopters so they cleared the area of zombies, so you're there until you walk, so as not to fall under attack. Oh, and you're around look us in the bunker.
